front.title: RTP Payload Format for the Speex Codec

abstract.t: Speex is an open-source, patent-free, voice codec suitable for use inVoice over IP (VoIP) type applications. This document describes the payload format for Speex generated bit streams within an RTP packet. Also included here are the necessary details for the use of Speex withthe Session Description Protocol (SDP) and a preliminary methodof using Speex within H.323 applications.
